channel.title: LSDR on Hurricane's Braindump
channel.description: Recent content in LSDR on Hurricane's Braindump

item.title: 737NG 雷击损伤
item.description: Table of Contents LSDR 损伤检查 对于蒙皮雷击 蒙皮雷击损伤的修理 对于紧固件雷击 单张蒙皮雷击后 LSDR 及飞行限制 机身段雷击后 LSDR 及飞行限制 搭接关键排和搭接非关键排的图示 机身蒙皮和桁条紧固件损伤的 LSDR 计算举例 飞行航班限制 其他部位的雷击损伤 definition of critical fastener row TODO lap joint non-critical row TODO lap joint critical row：搭接关键行。 butt joint Backlinks 概述 LSDR lighting strike damage rating 损伤检查 参考文件：SRM 53-00-01-1A-1。 Figure 1: allowable damage zones figure 图中“refer to paragraph 4.D for allowable damage due to lighting strike”，说明所有蒙皮雷击损伤标准在 SRM 53-00-01-1A-1 - ALLOWABLE DAMAGE 1 - FUSELAGE SKIN - 4.
